Package gg.w6.chesslib.model

Class Square

java.lang.Object
gg.w6.chesslib.model.Square
public class Square extends Object
Represents a single square on a standard 8x8 chessboard.

Each square has a fixed Coordinate (file and rank), and may contain a Piece or be empty (null). The square also provides utility methods to determine its color (black or white) based on board position.

Square objects are typically used as part of a 2D board array representing a full chess position, and are responsible for maintaining the local state of piece placement.

See Also:

  • Coordinate
